gw.api.community

Class PublicUserUtil

  • gw.api.community.PublicUserUtil

  • public class PublicUserUtil
    Provides basic utility methods for retrieving current user and its related objects.

    Access via User.util.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      com.guidewire.commons.metadata.i18n.config.GWLanguage CurrentLanguage
      Get the current user's language.
      com.guidewire.commons.metadata.i18n.config.GWLocale CurrentLocale
      Get the current user's locale.
      User CurrentUser
      Get the current user.
      User UnrestrictedUser
      Return the currently configured "unrestricted" user
      List<Object> UsersInCurrentUsersGroup
      Get a list of all users in the current user's group.
